document_data.name: King's Tower
document_data.mainbody: The '''King's Tower''' was a smooth-sided fortified construction on the west side of [[Marsember]] in [[Cormyr]].
document_data.Structure: The building's cobbled terrace was the largest open public space in the city.
document_data.Inhabitants:
The tower was the home of the Crown's representative in the city which in [[1367 DR]] was [[Bledryn Scoril]]

In the late 1400s DR, the [[Marsember Watch]] provided watchmen with Watch flans, which were [[steel]] meal tokens they could use to buy the cooperation of the hungry by letting them obtain a free full meal from the King's Tower.<ref>
